email.title: DoCSoc Sponsors' Exhibition - TOMORROW!
email.text:
Hi all!
Don't forget our annual DoCSoc Sponsors' Exhibition is **tomorrow** in the Great Hall from 14:00 to 17:00.
Come along to greet sponsors including tech giants such as Microsoft and Facebook, financial companies such as Jump Trading and G-Research and startups such as Next Jump and Artificial.
Don't forget to pick up the merchandise they're giving away, including t-shirts, mugs, pens, notebooks and more!
Be sure to [RSVP](https://www.facebook.com/events/2357745387873182/) to this event on Facebook so we can gauge attendance!

event.text:
Come to the Great Hall on Wednesday 9th October between 2pm - 5pm to have a chance to meet all of DoCSoc's Silver and Gold sponsors this year and grab some swag.
Whether you are looking for an internship or graduate role, or simply want to know more about industry, we really recommend you come along as it's a great way to get in direct contact with recruiters and engineers from highly regarded companies and should provide invaluable insight into the recruitment process.
This event is open to all DoCSoc members (automatically includes Computing, JMC, and EIE students).
